p: Neurogenesis is the denomination given to the process of differentiation of a progenitor cell into a neuron. The subventricular zone and hippocampus are the areas where this process usually occurs. Another interesting fact is that it is not such a rare event in the brain as we once thought [ 35]. Synaptogenesis is a process of formation of new synapses. It is one of the brain recovery mechanisms after TBI [ 36].
